Articles.Content:
PHEW!! Ive just got off of my tablet onto my laptop to post this and Im so relieved! I quickly wanted to log in to this forum and didnt realise that I was in incognito mode.......the whole layout of this forum looked SO different and I hated it!

"...? No way! This is awful" I thought......why do this?

Anyway, it's short and sweet as now I need a stiff drink to get over the shock!

For the record, my tablet is a Samsung Galaxy Tab 2 7.0 - If you have a similar device try it in incognito mode out if you like.......

........it's horrible!!
Could you upload a picture of it in incognito mode? My iPad I'm writing on doesn't have it.

Could you upload a picture of it in incognito mode? My iPad I'm writing on doesn't have it.

here it is
Oh, I actually think that is the mobile site! It looks pretty good right there, but if I didn't know what it was I would freak out.

Oh, I actually think that is the mobile site! It looks pretty good right there, but if I didn't know what it was I would freak out.

I did lol! If thats the mobile site then thank god I dont use it.....feels very isolated in comparison to the main site.

Another odd thing, my tablet has the ability to "request desktop site" by checking a box, but mine is unchecked and still shows the "proper" forum layout.

Still, im off to the pub now so I'll sink a few before I get home and rescue Bill from the Mun....

...have a good day my friend
Well, my iPad usually uses desktop sites except for youtube.

Oh, I actually think that is the mobile site! It looks pretty good right there, but if I didn't know what it was I would freak out.

I did lol! If thats the mobile site then thank god I dont use it.....feels very isolated in comparison to the main site.

Another odd thing, my tablet has the ability to "request desktop site" by checking a box, but mine is unchecked and still shows the "proper" forum layout.

Still, im off to the pub now so I'll sink a few before I get home and rescue Bill from the Mun....

...have a good day my friend

I don't mind the mobile site layout. It's almost functional.

I say almost because on couple occasions I tried editing my own post after posting it and it just went poof into oblivion.

I retyped it, tried editing again... poof into oblivion again.

Retype one more, and sausage fingers me again produced multiple typos that needed fixing.

Third time the charmed in editing, right? Nope... it went poof again.

Fourth time retype, check for typos and post. No editing.

A bit vexing

The mobile site is good for what it is intended for - mobile use.
I really wish they would use Tapatalk like all the other forums I visit. This is the only forum where I have to use the clunky old browser.

Lol! A good question and not the obvious answer! A simple double tap on my bookmarks tab that was a little off target, honest
